name: Misha

traceMaterials.itemName: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

story: A well-behaved young man serving as a hotel bellboy in Penacony.Misha has a great longing for the Nameless and dreams of one day embarking on a journey of his own.

skills.name: E—Excuse Me, Please!
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: R—Room Service!
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to an enemy and minor Ice DMG to enemies adjacent to them. In addition, increases Misha's next Ultimate's Hit Per Action.

skills.name: G—Gonna Be Late!
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to single enemies. The attack bounces #1[i] times by default and up to a maximum of #5[i] times. Before each hits land, there is a minor chance to Freeze the target.

skills.name: Horological Escapement
skills.description: For every 1 Skill Point allies consume, Misha's next Ultimate delivers more Hits Per Action, and Misha regenerates his Energy.

skills.name: Wait, You Are So Beautiful!
skills.description: Creates a dimension that stops all enemies within. Upon entering battle against enemies within the dimension, Misha's next Ultimate deals more Hits Per Action.

eidolons.name: Whimsicality of Fancy
eidolons.description: When using the Ultimate, for every enemy on the field, additionally increases the Hits Per Action for the current Ultimate by 1 hit(s), up to a maximum increase of 5 hit(s).

eidolons.name: Yearning of Youth
eidolons.description: Before each hit of the Ultimate lands, there is a 24% base chance of reducing the target's DEF by 16% for 3 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Vestige of Happiness
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Visage of Kinship
eidolons.description: Increases the DMG multiplier for each hit of the Ultimate by 6%.

eidolons.name: Genesis of First Love
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Estrangement of Dream
eidolons.description: When using the Ultimate, increases own DMG by 30%, lasting until the end of the turn. In addition, the next time the Skill is used, recovers 1 Skill Point(s) for the team.
